## slu generate-files tree

Generate tree of files

```
slu generate-files tree [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -c, --count int     Count of new files
  -h, --help          help for tree
  -p, --path string   Target path
  -s, --size int      Size in MB (default 1)
```
